comment: Could you share more details ? It's always important to know if a local community has special questions or needs . And obviously , thanks for your commitment !
amr:
# ::snt Could you share more details ? It's always important to know if a local community has special questions or needs . And obviously , thanks for your commitment !
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / possible-01
            :polarity (a / amr-unknown)
            :ARG1 (s / share-01
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (d / detail
                        :mod (m2 / more))))
      :snt2 (ii / important-01
            :ARG1 (k / know-01
                  :ARG1 (t / truth-value
                        :polarity-of (h / have-03
                              :ARG0 (c / community
                                    :ARG1-of (l / local-02))
                              :ARG1 (o / or
                                    :op1 (q / question-01
                                          :ARG0 c)
                                    :op2 (n / need-01
                                          :ARG0 c)
                                    :ARG1-of (s2 / special-02)))))
            :time (a2 / always))
      :snt3 (a3 / and
            :op2 (t2 / thank-01
                  :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
                  :ARG1 (y2 / you)
                  :ARG2 (c2 / commit-01
                        :ARG0 y2)
                  :ARG1-of (o2 / obvious-01))))

comment: Hi Marina ! Aulona & Kristina gave a general overview of the openSUSE distro , the community , shared several important links for everyone to check in order to get further involved . Hopefully more events will follow !
amr:
# ::snt Hi Marina ! Aulona & Kristina gave a general overview of the openSUSE distro , the community , shared several important links for everyone to check in order to get further involved . Hopefully more events will follow !
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (h / hi)
            :ARG2 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Marina")))
      :snt2 (s2 / share-01
            :ARG0 (a / and
                  :op1 (p2 / person
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Aulona"))
                  :op2 (p3 / person
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Kristina")))
            :ARG1 (l / link
                  :ARG1-of (ii2 / important-01)
                  :quant (s3 / several)
                  :ARG1-of (c / check-01
                        :ARG0 (e / everyone)
                        :purpose (g / get-03
                              :ARG0 e
                              :ARG1 (ii3 / involve-01
                                    :ARG1 e
                                    :degree (f / further)))))
            :ARG2-of (o / overview
                  :ARG1-of (g2 / general-02)
                  :poss (d / distro
                        :name (n4 / name
                              :op1 "OpenSUSE"))))
      :snt3 (h2 / hope-01
            :ARG1 (f2 / follow-01
                  :ARG1 (e2 / event
                        :quant (m2 / more)))))
